name: A Bunny Game
description:
This is my submission for the Godot Wild Jam (https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-19)

this was my first jam and my first published game! (although i might update it in  the future)

I had fun making it, and learned a lot through the process!

It's a game about a bunny who will discover the truth behind the princess's kidnapping .

It's a simple  2D platformer, similar to shovel knight (the downward attack is like the  shovel attack in shovel knight).
